#include <iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<cstring>
# define MAX 10
using namespace std;
int ispal(const char *s)
{
    const char *p = s + strlen(s) - 1;
    while (s < p)
        if (*p-- != *s++)
            return 0;

    return 1;
}

int main() {
	int t;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
      char s[MAX+1],s1[MAX+1];
      scanf("%s",s);
      int val=ispal(s);
      if(val==0)
      {
      	printf("NO\n");
      }
      else
      {
      	printf("YES\n");
      }
      
	}
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
